text: Anante kini ne' Nebukatnesa'a amanage huno hu'ne. Setrakima, Mesakima, Abetnegokizmi Anumzamo'a ankero'ama huntegeno eno eri'za naga'ama zamagu'ma vazia zankura, Agri agia ahentesga hanune. Na'ankure zamagra agrite zamentintia nehu'za, fri'zankura antahi amane hu'naze. Ana nehu'za nagrama ante'noa kasegegura koro nosu'za, ru anumzantera monora hunonte'za, zamagra'a Anumzanteke monora hunte'naze.
